text:
December 13, 1957
Dr* Burton Paulu, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
So far I have the following documents
or copies:
1* The first letter of Schwarzwalder*
Bronson to Schwarzwalder, November 18.
Paulu to Schwarzwalder, November 13.
Schwarzwalder to Paulu, November 15.
Schwarzwalder to Bronson, undated*
I assume you have all of the above*
To date, I*ve restrained myself and
written nothing*
Sincerely,
Prank E. Schooley
FESfb
